title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: LOT 1: 2013 CryptoVest 1 LTC, plated zinc alloyLOT 2: 2014 Ravenbit Series 2.3 Node Bronze "19KqVzqT", bronzeLOT 3: 2013 Lealana 0.1BTC #2054 "121jNAGa" Buyer Funded, brass*full address is not knownLOT 4: 2014 Geek Bitcoin 5mBTC, plated brassLOT 5: 2014 Microsoul 0.05BTC #198 "15BErD31", silver/giltSTARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0010BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: MARCH 13th, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: DECLINE TO BE LISTED

comments.author: Bitguy2016
comments.body: LOT 1: 0.001 BTCLOT 2: 0.003 BTCLOT 3: 0.0015 BTCLOT 4: 0.0015 BTCLOT 5: 0.0055 BTC

comments.author: av8rjeff
comments.body: Quote from: minerjones on March 08, 2023, 12:42:25 PMLOT 3: 2013 Lealana 0.1BTC #2054 "121jNAGa" Buyer Funded, brass*full address is not knownInteresting.  Any idea why the full address is not known or why the first bits don't work or show a balance, what ever it might be?  Is Smoothie able help or sort this coin out?

comments.body: LOT 1: 0.0016 BTCLOT 2: 0.0032 BTCLOT 3: 0.0016 BTCLOT 4: 0.0016 BTCLOT 5: 0.0058 BTC

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: av8rjeff on March 10, 2023, 05:34:25 AMQuote from: minerjones on March 08, 2023, 12:42:25 PMLOT 3: 2013 Lealana 0.1BTC #2054 "121jNAGa" Buyer Funded, brass*full address is not knownInteresting.  Any idea why the full address is not known or why the first bits don't work or show a balance, what ever it might be?  Is Smoothie able help or sort this coin out?Full address is not known because the original owner did not pass on this informationFirst bits will not work because the address has never been used, so would not appear on the blockchainAnd no, smoothie will not help with this nor is there a Lealana BTC address listQuote from: av8rjeff on March 10, 2023, 05:39:46 AMLOT 1: 0.0016 BTCLOT 2: 0.0032 BTCLOT 3: 0.0016 BTCLOT 4: 0.0016 BTCLOT 5: 0.0058 BTCCurrent high bids
